trans-unit.source: Provides the base class from which the classes that represent expression tree nodes are derived.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种基类，表示表达式树节点的类派生自该基类。

trans-unit.source: It also contains <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) factory methods to create the various node types.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含用来创建各种节点类型的 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />）工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: This is an <see langword="abstract" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 <see langword="abstract" /> 类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a block expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建块表达式。

trans-unit.source: The block expression consists of two <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> objects and one <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: 块表达式包含两个<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>对象和一个<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression>对象。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 构造 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 构造 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> to set as the node type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> 设置为节点类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 从派生类中的构造函数调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The visitor to visit this node with.
trans-unit.target: 对此节点进行访问的访问者。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches to the specific visit method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 调度到此节点类型的特定 Visit 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> calls the <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> 调用 <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />。

trans-unit.source: The result of visiting this node.
trans-unit.target: 对此节点访问的结果。

trans-unit.source: This default implementation for <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension> nodes calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此默认实现<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension>节点调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to call into a more specific method on a derived visitor class of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor> class.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以调入派生的访问者类的更具体的方法<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor>类。

trans-unit.source: However, it should still support unknown visitors by calling <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它仍应通过调用支持未知的访问者<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的算术加法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的算术加法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载加法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that adds two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建添加两个整数一个表达式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义加法运算符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的算术加法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Add" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载加法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义加法运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an addition assignment operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的加法赋值运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an addition assignment operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的加法赋值运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddAssign" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that adds a value to an integer variable and then assigns the result of the operation to the variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式将值添加到一个整数变量，然后将该操作的结果赋给变量。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an addition assignment operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的加法赋值运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddChecked" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载加法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The addition operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义加法运算符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic addition operation that has overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示进行溢出检查的算术加法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddChecked" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AddChecked" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 该操作的实现方法是选择根据以下规则：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载加法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 运算的 <see langword="AND" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 运算的 <see langword="AND" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.And" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.And" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`AND`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为整数或布尔类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是的结果类型预定义的按位`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应的结果类型预定义的按位`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="AND" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`AND`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `AND` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 条件性`AND`C# 或 Visual Basic 中不能重载运算符。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `AND` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在条件`AND`运算符计算通过使用按位`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `AND` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此的用户定义重载的按位`AND`运算符可以是此节点类型实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为布尔值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型的相同布尔类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的条件的结果类型`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的条件的结果类型`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that performs a logical AND operation on its two operands only if the first operand evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式执行逻辑和操作其两个操作数仅当第一个操作数的计算结果为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义按位 <see langword="AND" /> 运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是同一布尔值类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="AND" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand is resolved to true.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，它表示仅在第一个操作数解析为 true 时，才计算第二个操作数的条件 <see langword="AND" /> 运算。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AndAlso" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.AndAlso" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 该操作的实现方法是选择根据以下规则：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`AND`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `AND` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 条件性`AND`C# 或 Visual Basic 中不能重载运算符。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `AND` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在条件`AND`运算符计算通过使用按位`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `AND` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此的用户定义重载的按位`AND`运算符可以是此节点类型实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为布尔值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型的相同布尔类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的条件的结果类型`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的条件的结果类型`AND`运算符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the bitwise <see langword="AND" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义按位 <see langword="AND" /> 运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 并且 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是同一布尔值类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> to access an array.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用于访问数组的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An expression that represents the multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示多维数组的表达式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> containing expressions used to index the array.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含用于为数组编制索引的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> to access a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用于访问多维数组的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The expression that represents the array can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A> method, or through <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用可以获取表示数组的表达式<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A>方法，或通过<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to change the value of an element in a multidimensional array by using the `ArrayAccess` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用更改多维数组中元素的值`ArrayAccess`方法。

trans-unit.source: An expression representing the array to index.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要编制索引的数组的表达式。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains expressions used to index the array.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含用于为数组编制索引的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> to access an array.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用于访问数组的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The expression that represents the array can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A> method, or through <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用可以获取表示数组的表达式<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeMemberAccess%2A>方法，或通过<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayBounds%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NewArrayInit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For multidimensional arrays, use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于多维数组，使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ArrayAccess%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to change a value of an array element by using the `ArrayAccess` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用更改的数组元素值`ArrayAccess`方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents applying an array index operator.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示应用数组索引运算符的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents applying an array index operator to an array of rank more than one.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left%2A> property is set to `array` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right%2A> property is set to the single element of `indexes`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `expression` must be assignable to the type represented by the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of the property accessed in `propertyAccessor`.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that specifies the instance for an instance method call (pass <see langword="null" /> for a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，它指定一个实例方法调用，对于 <see langword="null" /> 方法（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="static" /> 方法）应传递 <see langword="Shared" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method that takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，它表示调用不带参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: To represent a call to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, pass in `null` for the `instance` parameter when you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，请传入`null`为`instance`参数时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If `method` represents an instance method, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `instance` must be assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`表示实例方法，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性`instance`必须是可分配给所表示的方法的声明类型`method`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>为空。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性等于所表示的方法的返回类型`method`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that calls a method without arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来调用不带参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="method" /> represents an instance method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="method" /> 表示一种实例方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" />.Type 不可分配给由 <paramref name="method" /> 表示的方法声明类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the target method.
trans-unit.target: 表示目标方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the call arguments.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用参数的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a static (Shared in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，它表示对 static 方法（在 Visual Basic 中为 Shared 方法）的调用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示第一个参数的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，它表示对使用一个参数的 <see langword="static" /> 方法（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" /> 方法）的调用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that calls a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表达式来调用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用一个自变量的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 表示 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />）方法，以将 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为与其相等。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method that has arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，它表示调用有参数的 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />）方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`arguments`不`null`，它必须具有相同数量的元素所表示的方法的参数的数目为`method`。

trans-unit.source: Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: 在每个元素`arguments`不得`null`，并且必须可分配给的相应参数`method`、 可能后*用引号括起来*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 仅当相应的方法参数为的类型，元素将用引号引起来<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 用引号括起来的意味着元素包装在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>节点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 生成的节点是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>属性是元素`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>为空如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将包含与相同的元素`arguments`，其中一些可能带引号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等于所表示的方法的返回类型`method`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in <paramref name="arguments" /> does not equal the number of parameters for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 中的元素数量与 <paramref name="method" /> 表示的方法的参数数量不相等。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One or more of the elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the corresponding parameter for the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法将 <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一个或多个元素分配给由 <paramref name="method" /> 表示的方法的相应参数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property equal to (pass <see langword="null" /> for a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method).
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />，它为 <see langword="null" />（在 Visual Basic 中则为<see langword="static" />）方法传递 <see langword="Shared" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含用来填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method that takes arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示调用带参数的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: To represent a call to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, pass in `null` for the `instance` parameter when you call this method, or call <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，请传入`null`为`instance`参数时调用此方法，或调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Call%2A>相反。

trans-unit.source: If `method` represents an instance method, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `instance` must be assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`表示实例方法，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性`instance`必须是可分配给所表示的方法的声明类型`method`。

trans-unit.source: If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`arguments`不`null`，它必须具有相同数量的元素所表示的方法的参数的数目为`method`。

trans-unit.source: Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: 在每个元素`arguments`不得`null`，并且必须可分配给的相应参数`method`、 可能后*用引号括起来*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 仅当相应的方法参数为的类型，元素将用引号引起来<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 用引号括起来的意味着元素包装在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>节点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 生成的节点是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>属性是元素`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>为空如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将包含与相同的元素`arguments`，其中一些可能带引号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等于所表示的方法的返回类型`method`。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="method" /> represents an instance method.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that specifies the instance for an instance method call (pass <see langword="null" /> for a <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) method).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，它指定一个实例方法调用，对于 <see langword="null" /> 方法（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="static" /> 方法）应传递 <see langword="Shared" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a static method that takes two arguments.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
