trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that calls an instance method that has two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来调用包含两个参数的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property value will be searched for a specific method.
trans-unit.target: 将搜索 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性值，查看其是否有特定方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type parameters of the generic method.
trans-unit.target: 指定泛型方法的类型参数的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: This argument should be null when methodName specifies a non-generic method.
trans-unit.target: 当 methodName 指定非泛型方法时，此自变量应为 null。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that represents the arguments to the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 对象的数组，表示方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that represents a call to a method by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用合适的工厂方法，创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" />，它表示方法调用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> property equal to <paramref name="instance" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the specified instance method, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> set to the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Call" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Object" /> 属性等于 <paramref name="instance" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Method" /> 设置为表示指定实例方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression.Arguments" /> 设置为指定参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> is equal to the return type of the method denoted by `methodName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>等同于表示的方法的返回类型`methodName`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" /> or <paramref name="methodName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 或 <paramref name="methodName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No method whose name is <paramref name="methodName" />, whose type parameters match <paramref name="typeArguments" />, and whose parameter types match <paramref name="arguments" /> is found in <paramref name="instance" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="methodName" />.Type 或其基类型中找不到这样的方法：名称为 <paramref name="typeArguments" />、类型参数与 <paramref name="arguments" /> 相匹配，且参数类型与 <paramref name="instance" /> 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: More than one method whose name is <paramref name="methodName" />, whose type parameters match <paramref name="typeArguments" />, and whose parameter types match <paramref name="arguments" /> is found in <paramref name="instance" />.Type or its base types.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the node can be reduced to a simpler node.

trans-unit.source: If this returns true, Reduce() can be called to produce the reduced form.

trans-unit.source: True if the node can be reduced, otherwise false.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示合并运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示合并运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> is `null` and both <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> are set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>是`null`且两<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is equal to the result type of the coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性等于合并运算的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Result Type
trans-unit.target: 结果类型

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the result type:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定的结果类型：

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type represents a nullable type and `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to the corresponding non-nullable type, the result type is the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型表示可以为 null 的类型和`right`。类型是隐式转换为相应的非 null 的类型，结果的类型是不可为 null 等效于`left`。类型。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to `left`.Type, the result type is `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`right`。类型是隐式转换为`left`。类型的结果类型是`left`。类型。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type is implicitly convertible to `right`.Type, the result type is `right`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果不可以为 null 等效于`left`。类型是隐式转换为`right`。类型的结果类型是`right`。类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="left" /> does not represent a reference type or a nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性不表示引用类型或可以为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not convertible to each other.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不可相互转换。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a coalescing operation, given a conversion function.
trans-unit.target: 在给定转换函数的情况下，创建一个表示合并运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Coalesce" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> is `null` and both <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> are set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>是`null`且两<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> is equal to the result type of the coalescing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>等同于合并运算的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the result type:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定的结果类型：

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type represents a nullable type and `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to the corresponding non-nullable type, the result type is the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型表示可以为 null 的类型和`right`。类型是隐式转换为相应的非 null 的类型，结果的类型是不可为 null 等效于`left`。类型。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `right`.Type is implicitly convertible to `left`.Type, the result type is `left`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`right`。类型是隐式转换为`left`。类型的结果类型是`left`。类型。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the non-nullable equivalent of `left`.Type is implicitly convertible to `right`.Type, the result type is `right`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果不可以为 null 等效于`left`。类型是隐式转换为`right`。类型的结果类型是`right`。类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not convertible to each other.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不可相互转换。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="conversion" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="conversion" />.Type is a delegate type that does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="conversion" /> 不为 <see langword="null" />，并且 <paramref name="conversion" />.Type 为不是正好带一个参数的委托类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="left" /> does not represent a reference type or a nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性不表示引用类型或可以为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="left" /> represents a type that is not assignable to the parameter type of the delegate type <paramref name="conversion" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性表示一个类型，该类型不能赋给委托类型 <paramref name="conversion" />.Type 的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of <paramref name="right" /> is not equal to the return type of the delegate type <paramref name="conversion" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="right" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性不等于委托类型 <paramref name="conversion" />.Type 的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that represents a conditional statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示条件语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that represents a conditional statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示条件语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `ifTrue`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression>等同于<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性`ifTrue`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a conditional statement.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表示条件语句的表达式。

trans-unit.source: If the first argument evaluates to `true`, the second argument is executed; otherwise, the third argument is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个自变量的计算结果为`true`，第二个参数是执行; 否则为执行第三个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="test" /> or <paramref name="ifTrue" /> or <paramref name="ifFalse" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="test" />、<paramref name="ifTrue" /> 或 <paramref name="ifFalse" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="test" />.Type is not <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="test" />.Type 不为 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ifTrue" />.Type is not equal to <paramref name="ifFalse" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ifTrue" />.Type 不等于 <paramref name="ifFalse" />.Type。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that represents a conditional statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示条件语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Conditional" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.Test" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfTrue" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression.IfFalse" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: This method allows explicitly unifying the result type of the conditional expression in cases where the types of `ifTrue` and `ifFalse` expressions are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许显式将用例中的条件表达式的结果类型其中的类型`ifTrue`和`ifFalse`表达式是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: Types of both `ifTrue` and `ifFalse` must be implicitly reference assignable to the result type.
trans-unit.target: 这两种`ifTrue`和`ifFalse`必须可隐式引用赋给的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The `type` is allowed to be <xref:System.Void>.
trans-unit.target: `type`允许为<xref:System.Void>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" />，它把 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Constant" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Constant" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression> is equal to the type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression>等于的一种`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> is equal to <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是`null`，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>等同于<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: To represent `null`, you can also use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Constant%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> method, with which you can explicitly specify the type.
trans-unit.target: 若要表示`null`，你还可以使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Constant%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>方法，与你可以显式指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a constant value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来表示常量值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" />，它把 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Constant" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Constant" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression.Value" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: This method can be useful for representing values of nullable types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于表示可以为 null 的类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a constant of the nullable type and set its value to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表示可以为 null 的类型的常量表达式并将其值设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="type" /> is not assignable from the dynamic type of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不为 <see langword="null" /> 并且 <paramref name="type" /> 不可从 <paramref name="value" /> 的动态类型赋值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a continue statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示 continue 语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 将跳至的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a continue statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示 continue 语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Continue, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to <paramref name="target" />, and a null value to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等于 Continue，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="target" />，此外还有一个在跳转时将传递给目标标签的 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a loop expression that uses the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Continue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建了循环表达式使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Continue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 将跳至的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a continue statement with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示具有指定类型的 continue 语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Continue, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to <paramref name="target" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <paramref name="type" />, and a null value to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等于 Continue，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="target" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="type" />，此外还有一个在跳转时将传递给目标标签的 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a type conversion operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示类型转换运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a type conversion operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示类型转换运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`是用户定义的类型定义隐式或显式转换运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否则：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`表示数值或布尔类型或可以为 null 或非可为 null 的枚举类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`为引用类型和显式装箱，取消装箱，或引用转换存在从`expression`。类型转换为`type`，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是赋给实现的方法的自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型是可分配给`type`，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If one or both of `expression`.Type or `type` is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或两个的`expression`。类型或`type`是可以为 null 的值类型和相应的不可为 null 的值类型等于自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型分别为，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`是否不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a type convertion operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来表示类型转换运算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No conversion operator is defined between <paramref name="expression" />.Type and <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: 未定义 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 和 <paramref name="type" /> 之间的转换运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation for which the implementing method is specified.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，它表示为其指定实现方法的转换运算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If method is not `null`, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法不是`null`，它是实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: It must represent a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 非空，则它必须表示`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用一个自变量的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`是用户定义的类型定义隐式或显式转换运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否则：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`表示数值或布尔类型或可以为 null 或非可为 null 的枚举类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`为引用类型和显式装箱，取消装箱，或引用转换存在从`expression`。类型转换为`type`，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是赋给实现的方法的自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型是可分配给`type`，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If either or both of `expression`.Type or `type` are a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或两个的`expression`。类型或`type`是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可为 null 的值类型分别为等于自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`是否不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不为 <see langword="null" /> 且其表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />；不为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中不为 <see langword="Shared" />）；或者不是正好带一个参数。

trans-unit.source: No conversion operator is defined between <paramref name="expression" />.Type and <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: 未定义 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 和 <paramref name="type" /> 之间的转换运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the argument type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 不能赋给 <paramref name="method" /> 所表示的方法的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The return type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" /> is not assignable to <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 所表示的方法的返回类型不能赋给 <paramref name="type" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type or <paramref name="type" /> is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type does not equal the argument type or the return type, respectively, of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 或 <paramref name="type" /> 为可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可以为 null 的值类型不分别等于 <paramref name="method" /> 所表示的方法的参数类型或返回类型。

trans-unit.source: More than one method that matches the <paramref name="method" /> description was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个与 <paramref name="method" /> 说明相匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation that throws an exception if the target type is overflowed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，它表示在目标类型发生溢出时引发异常的转换运算。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation that throws an exception if the target type is overflowed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，它表示在目标类型发生溢出时引发异常的转换运算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ConvertChecked" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ConvertChecked" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`是用户定义的类型定义隐式或显式转换运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否则：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`表示数值或布尔类型或可以为 null 或非可为 null 的枚举类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`为引用类型和显式装箱，取消装箱，或引用转换存在从`expression`。类型转换为`type`，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是赋给实现的方法的自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型是可分配给`type`，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If either or both of `expression`.Type or `type` are a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或两个的`expression`。类型或`type`是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可为 null 的值类型分别为等于自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`是否不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No conversion operator is defined between <paramref name="expression" />.Type and <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: 未定义 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 和 <paramref name="type" /> 之间的转换运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a conversion operation that throws an exception if the target type is overflowed and for which the implementing method is specified.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，它表示在目标类型发生溢出时引发异常且为其指定实现方法的转换运算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ConvertChecked" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ConvertChecked" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If method is not `null`, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法不是`null`，它是实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: It must represent a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument.
trans-unit.target: 非空，则它必须表示`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用一个自变量的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise:
trans-unit.target: 否则：

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`表示数值或布尔类型或可以为 null 或非可为 null 的枚举类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`expression`。类型或`type`为引用类型和显式装箱，取消装箱，或引用转换存在从`expression`。类型转换为`type`，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是赋给实现的方法的自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型是可分配给`type`，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If either or both of `expression`.Type or `type` are a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或两个的`expression`。类型或`type`是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可为 null 的值类型分别为等于自变量类型和实现方法的返回类型，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个`expression`。类型和`type`是否不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the node is lifted.

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the division operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载除法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的除法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的除法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that divides divides its first argument by its second argument.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式将会将其划分其第二个自变量的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The division operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义除法运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic division operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示算术除法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the division operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载除法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的除法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined division operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的除法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the division operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义除法运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that represents a dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示动态操作的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The runtime binder for the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的运行时联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the dynamic expression.
trans-unit.target: 动态表达式的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that represents a dynamic operation bound by the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，它表示由提供的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> 绑定的动态操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" /> and has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> 均设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType%2A>将从自变量类型推断出的结果的属性和指定返回类型。

trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />（包含 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 对象）要将 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 属性设置为与其相等。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />, given an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> as the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 在给定 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> 作为第二个参数的情况下，创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The `addMethod` parameter must represent an instance method named "Add" (case insensitive).
trans-unit.target: `addMethod`参数必须表示名为"Add"（不区分大小写） 的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: The add method must have the same number of parameters as the number of elements in `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法必须具有相同数量的参数中的元素数为`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element in `arguments` must be assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the add method, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>中每个元素的属性`arguments`必须赋给 add 方法的相应参数的类型可能后*用引号括起来*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 仅当相应的方法参数为的类型，元素将用引号引起来<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 用引号括起来的意味着元素包装在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>节点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 生成的节点是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>属性是元素`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29> method to create an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> that represents calling the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A> method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29>方法来创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit>，表示调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A>方法以初始化字典集合的某个元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="addMethod" /> or <paramref name="arguments" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 或 <paramref name="arguments" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents is not named "Add" (case insensitive).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 表示的方法的名称不是“Add”（不区分大小写）。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents is not an instance method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 表示的方法不是实例方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arguments" /> does not contain the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 不包含与 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 表示的方法的参数数目相同的元素数目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of one or more elements of <paramref name="arguments" /> is not assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the method that <paramref name="addMethod" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一个或多个元素的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性不能赋给 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 表示的方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />, given an array of values as the second argument.

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.target: `addMethod`参数必须表示名为"Add"（不区分大小写） 的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: The add method must have the same number of parameters as the number of elements in `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法必须具有相同数量的参数中的元素数为`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of each element in `arguments` must be assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the add method, possibly after *quoting*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>中每个元素的属性`arguments`必须赋给 add 方法的相应参数的类型可能后*用引号括起来*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 仅当相应的方法参数为的类型，元素将用引号引起来<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.target: 用引号括起来的意味着元素包装在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>节点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 生成的节点是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>属性是元素`arguments`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ElementInit%28System.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%5B%5D%29> method to create an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> that represents calling the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602.Add%2A> method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> 或 <paramref name="arguments" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: addMethod 表示的方法未命名为"Add"（不区分大小写）。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 或
