trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 的一个或多个元素的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性不能赋给 <paramref name="addMethod" /> 表示的方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty expression that has <see cref="T:System.Void" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有 <see cref="T:System.Void" /> 类型的空表达式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Default" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <see cref="T:System.Void" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DefaultExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Default" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.Void" />。

trans-unit.source: An empty expression can be used where an expression is expected but no action is desired.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用空表达式，其中需要表达式，但不需要执行操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use an empty expression as the last expression in a block expression.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用一个空表达式作为块表达式中的最后一个表达式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the block expression's return value is void.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，块表达式的返回值为 void。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an empty expression and add it to a block expression.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个空表达式并将其添加到块表达式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示相等比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示相等比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性始终为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载相等运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两个条件时，提升节点和节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that checks whether the values of its two arguments are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来检查其两个参数的值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The equality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义相等运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <see langword="true" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要将 <see langword="false" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示相等比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Equal" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性等于`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载相等运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点;此外，节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the equality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义相等运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="XOR" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 运算的 <see langword="XOR" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="XOR" /> operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 通过对用户定义的类型使用 <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c>，创建一个表示按位 <see langword="XOR" /> 运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the `XOR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的用户定义类型`XOR`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为整数或布尔类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的结果类型`XOR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的结果类型`XOR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="XOR" /> operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的结果类型`XOR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的结果类型`XOR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the <see langword="XOR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义 <see langword="XOR" /> 运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise XOR assignment operation, using <c>op_ExclusiveOr</c> for user-defined types.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ExclusiveOrAssign" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示访问字段的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), <c>expression</c> must be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），<c>expression</c> 必须是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示访问字段的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> property of `field`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等同于<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>属性`field`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="field" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="field" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The field represented by <paramref name="field" /> is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) and <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="field" /> 表示的字段不为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中不为 <see langword="Shared" />），且 <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the field represented by <paramref name="field" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 不能赋给 <paramref name="field" /> 所表示的字段的声明类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> contains a field named <c>fieldName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 中包含一个名为 <c>fieldName</c> 的字段。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static fields.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态字段，这可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: The name of a field to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field given the name of the field.
trans-unit.target: 在给定字段名称的情况下，创建一个表示访问此字段的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> that represents the field denoted by <paramref name="fieldName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="expression" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />（表示由 <paramref name="fieldName" /> 表示的字段）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents the field denoted by `fieldName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等同于<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>属性<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>所表示的字段表示`fieldName`。

trans-unit.source: This method searches `expression`.Type and its base types for a field that has the name `fieldName`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索`expression`。类型和具有名称的字段及其基类型`fieldName`。

trans-unit.source: Public fields are given preference over non-public fields.
trans-unit.target: 公共字段的优先级高于非公共字段。

trans-unit.source: If a matching field is found, this method passes `expression` and the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents that field to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的字段，则此方法将传递`expression`和<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>表示该字段设置为<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表示访问字段的表达式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="fieldName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="fieldName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No field named <paramref name="fieldName" /> is defined in <paramref name="expression" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: 没有在 <paramref name="fieldName" />.Type 或其基类型中定义名为 <paramref name="expression" /> 的字段。

trans-unit.source: The containing object of the field.
trans-unit.target: 字段的包含对象。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static fields.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态字段，这可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: 包含字段的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The field to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的字段。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a field.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示访问字段的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of up to sixteen <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type arguments for the <see langword="System.Action" /> delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 包含多达十六个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，它指定 <see langword="System.Action" /> 委托类型的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents a generic <c>System.Action</c> delegate type that has specific type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，它表示具有特定类型参数的泛型 <c>System.Action</c> 委托类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of a <c>System.Action</c> delegate that has the specified type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定类型参数的 <c>System.Action</c> 委托的类型。

trans-unit.source: As an example, if the elements of `typeArgs` represent the types `T1…Tn`, the resulting <xref:System.Type> object represents the constructed delegate type `System.Action<T1,…,Tn>` in C# or `System.Action(Of T1,…,Tn)` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的元素`typeArgs`表示类型`T1…Tn`，生成<xref:System.Type>对象表示构造的委托类型`System.Action<T1,…,Tn>`C# 中或`System.Action(Of T1,…,Tn)`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> contains more than sixteen elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 包含 16 个以上的元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type arguments of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 该委托的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> object that represents a generic <c>System.Func</c> or <c>System.Action</c> delegate type that has specific type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 对象，表示具有特定类型参数的泛型 <c>System.Func</c> 或 <c>System.Action</c> 委托类型。

trans-unit.source: The delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 委托类型。

trans-unit.source: The last type argument determines the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个类型自变量确定委托的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If no Func or Action is large enough, it will generate a custom delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 Func 或操作为足够大，它将生成一个自定义的委托类型。

trans-unit.source: As with Func, the last argument is the return type.
trans-unit.target: 与 Func 一样，最后一个参数是返回类型。

trans-unit.source: It can be set to System.Void to produce an Action.
trans-unit.target: 它可以设置为 System.Void 生成操作。

trans-unit.source: An array of one to seventeen <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that specify the type arguments for the <see langword="System.Func" /> delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 包含一到十七个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，它指定 <see langword="System.Func" /> 委托类型的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> object that represents a generic <c>System.Func</c> delegate type that has specific type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 对象，表示具有特定类型参数的泛型 <c>System.Func</c> 委托类型。

trans-unit.source: The last type argument specifies the return type of the created delegate.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个类型参数指定已创建委托的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of a <c>System.Func</c> delegate that has the specified type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定类型参数的 <c>System.Func</c> 委托的类型。

trans-unit.source: `typeArgs` must contain at least one and at most seventeen elements.
trans-unit.target: `typeArgs` 必须包含至少一个和最多十七元素。

trans-unit.source: As an example, if the elements of `typeArgs` represent the types `T1…Tn`, the resulting <xref:System.Type> object represents the constructed delegate type `System.Func<T1,…,Tn>` in C# or `System.Func(Of T1,…,Tn)` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的元素`typeArgs`表示类型`T1…Tn`，生成<xref:System.Type>对象表示构造的委托类型`System.Func<T1,…,Tn>`C# 中或`System.Func(Of T1,…,Tn)`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> contains fewer than one or more than seventeen elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 包含少于一个或多于十七个的元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeArgs" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“go to”语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 将跳至的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a "go to" statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“go to”语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to Goto, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to the specified value, and a null value to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等于 Goto，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 属性设置为指定值，此外还有一个在跳转时将传递给目标标签的 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that contains a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建包含一个表达式<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“大于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性始终为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示"大于"运算符重载的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两个条件时，提升节点和节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来比较两个整数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The "greater than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义"大于"运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <see langword="true" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要将 <see langword="false" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“大于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性等于`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation :
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示"大于"运算符重载的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点;此外，节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "greater than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义"大于"运算符。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“大于或等于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性始终为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than or equal" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示"大于或等于"运算符重载的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两个条件时，提升节点和节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来比较两个整数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The "greater than or equal" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义"大于或等于"运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <see langword="true" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要将 <see langword="false" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "greater than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“大于或等于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性等于`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "greater than or equal" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示"大于或等于"运算符重载的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点;此外，节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "greater than or equal" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义“大于或等于”运算符。

trans-unit.target: 一个包含 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，这些对象表示要对其应用委托或 lambda 表达式的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" /> that applies a delegate or lambda expression to a list of argument expressions.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" />，它将委托或 lambda 表达式应用于一个参数表达式列表。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" /> that applies the specified delegate or lambda expression to the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression" />，它对提供的参数应用指定的委托或 lambda 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> represents the return type of the delegate that is represented by `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>表示由该委托的返回类型`expression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Arguments%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> is empty if `arguments` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Arguments%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>为空如果`arguments`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments` except that some of these <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> objects may be *quoted*.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将包含与相同的元素`arguments`只是其中一些这些<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>对象可能*带引号的*。

trans-unit.source: An element will be quoted only if the corresponding parameter of the delegate represented by `expression` is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>.
trans-unit.target: 仅当该委托的相应参数所表示，元素将用引号引起来`expression`属于类型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>。

trans-unit.source: Quoting means the element is wrapped in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote> node.
trans-unit.target: 用引号括起来的意味着元素包装在<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote>节点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting node is a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> whose <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A> property is the element of `arguments`.
trans-unit.target: 生成的节点是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>其<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand%2A>属性是元素`arguments`。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指示在编译创建的表达式时是否将应用尾调用优化。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 其中包含用于填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.target: 通过先构造一个委托类型来创建一个 LambdaExpression。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> property equal to Lambda and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 Lambda，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 属性均设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: The name for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: lambda 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Used for emitting debug information.
trans-unit.target: 用于发出调试信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.

trans-unit.target: 通过先构造一个委托类型来创建一个 LambdaExpression。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> property equal to Lambda and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 Lambda，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 属性均设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents a delegate signature for the lambda.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，它表示 lambda 的委托签名。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含用来填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" /> by first constructing a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 通过先构造一个委托类型来创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: It can be used when the delegate type is not known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托类型在编译时未知，则可以使用它。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a lambda expression which has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 lambda 表达式的对象，该表达式的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Lambda" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Body" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The object that is returned from this function is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回的对象属于类型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression> type is used to represent the returned object because the concrete type of the lambda expression is not known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression>类型用于表示返回的对象，因为在编译时不知道 lambda 表达式的具体类型。

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters for the delegate type represented by`delegateType` must equal the length of `parameters`.
trans-unit.target: 表示的委托类型的参数的数目`delegateType`必须等于的长度`parameters`。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`.
trans-unit.target: 元素`parameters`必须是引用等于中的参数表达式`body`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting object is equal to `delegateType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成的对象是否等于`delegateType`。

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` is `null`, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters%2A> property of the resulting object is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parameters`是`null`、<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression.Parameters%2A>所生成对象的属性为空集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a lambda expression that adds 1 to the passed argument.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表示将 1 添加到传递的参数的 lambda 表达式的表达式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> or <paramref name="body" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 或 <paramref name="body" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One or more elements in <paramref name="parameters" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 中的一个或多个元素为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delegateType" /> does not represent a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delegateType" /> 不表示委托类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="body" />.Type represents a type that is not assignable to the return type of the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="body" />.Type 表示一个类型，该类型不能赋给 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示的委托类型的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameters" /> does not contain the same number of elements as the list of parameters for the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 没有包含与 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示的委托类型的参数列表相同数量的元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="parameters" /> is not assignable from the type of the corresponding parameter type of the delegate type represented by <paramref name="delegateType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 的元素的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性不可从 <paramref name="delegateType" /> 所表示的委托类型的相应参数类型的类型赋值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
