trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the left-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载左移运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型是整数类型 (之一<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或可以为 null 的对应类型) 和`right`。类型是<xref:System.Int32>，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的左移运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的左移运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The left-shift operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义左移位运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise left-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位左移运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LeftShift" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the left-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载左移运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型是整数类型 (之一<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或可以为 null 的对应类型) 和`right`。类型是<xref:System.Int32>，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义左移位运算符。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 该操作的实现方法是选择根据以下规则：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示"小于"运算符重载的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两个条件时，提升节点和节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来比较两个整数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The "less than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义"小于"运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <see langword="true" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要将 <see langword="false" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a "less than" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“小于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThan" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThan" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性等于`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than" operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示"小于"运算符重载的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点;此外，节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "less than" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" /> 类型和 <paramref name="right" /> 类型定义“小于”运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a " less than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“小于或等于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a " less than or equal" numeric comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示“小于或等于”数值比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性始终为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点;此外，节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the "less than or equal" operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义"小于或等于"运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that uses specified <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" /> objects to initialize a collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> 对象来初始化集合的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ListInit" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers" /> properties set to the specified values.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `newExpression` must represent a type that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性`newExpression`必须表示实现的类型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> is equal to `newExpression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>等同于`newExpression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit%5B%5D%29> method to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> that represents the initialization of a new dictionary instance with two key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit%5B%5D%29>方法来创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>表示对使用两个键-值对的新字典实例的初始化。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newExpression" /> or <paramref name="initializers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newExpression" /> 或 <paramref name="initializers" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One or more elements of <paramref name="initializers" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的一个或多个元素为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type does not implement <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type 不实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含用来填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that uses a method named "Add" to add elements to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用名为“Add”的方法将元素添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ListInit" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.ListInit" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.NewExpression" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of `newExpression` must represent a type that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性`newExpression`必须表示实现的类型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: In order to use this overload of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7D%29>, `newExpression`.Type or its base type must declare a single method named "Add" (case insensitive) that takes exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的此重载<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.ListInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7D%29>， `newExpression`。类型或其基类型必须声明一个带且只有一个参数的单个方法名为"Add"（不区分大小写）。

trans-unit.source: The type of the argument must be assignable from the type represented by the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the first element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: 自变量的类型必须是可表示的类型从<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>的第一个元素的属性`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> contains one element of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> for each element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>包含类型的一个元素<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit>的每个元素`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> is a singleton collection that contains the corresponding element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A>的每个元素的属性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>是单一实例集合，其中包含的相应元素`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> represents the add method that was discovered on `newExpression`.Type or its base type.

trans-unit.target: 表示的类型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>的每个元素的属性`initializers`必须是可赋值给 add 方法的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> contains one element of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit> for each element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>包含类型的一个元素<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit>的每个元素`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> is a singleton collection that contains the corresponding element of `initializers`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.Arguments%2A>的每个元素的属性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>是单一实例集合，其中包含的相应元素`initializers`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A> property of each element of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A> is equal to `addMethod`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ElementInit.AddMethod%2A>的每个元素的属性<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression.Initializers%2A>等同于`addMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression> is equal to `newExpression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ListInitExpression>等同于`newExpression`。类型。

trans-unit.target: 在给定左操作数和右操作数的情况下，通过调用适当的工厂方法来创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The `binaryType` parameter determines which <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> factory method this method calls.
trans-unit.target: `binaryType`参数确定哪个<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>此方法调用的工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `binaryType` is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract>, this method invokes <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Subtract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`binaryType`是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract>，此方法调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Subtract%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The second argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第二个自变量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that represents a dynamic operation bound by the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> and two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，它表示由提供的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> 和两个参数绑定的动态操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" /> and has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> 均设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the delegate used by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSite" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSite" /> 使用的委托的类型。

trans-unit.source: The runtime binder for the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的运行时联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The first argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: The second argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第二个自变量。

trans-unit.source: The third argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第三个自变量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that represents a dynamic operation bound by the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> and three arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，它表示由提供的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> 和三个参数绑定的动态操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" /> and has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> 均设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the delegate used by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSite" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSite" /> 使用的委托的类型。

trans-unit.source: The runtime binder for the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的运行时联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The first argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: The second argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第二个自变量。

trans-unit.source: The third argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第三个自变量。

trans-unit.source: The fourth argument to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的第四个参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that represents a dynamic operation bound by the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> and four arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，它表示由提供的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> 和四个参数绑定的动态操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" /> and has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Dynamic" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.DelegateType" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Binder" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.DynamicExpression.Arguments" /> 均设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpressionKind" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpressionKind" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> will jump to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 将跳至的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The value that will be passed to the associated label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 将在跳转时传递给关联标签的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> representing a jump of the specified <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpressionKind" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，它表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpressionKind" /> 的跳转。

trans-unit.source: The value passed to the label upon jumping can also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 也可以指定在跳转时传递给标签的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" /> with <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> equal to <paramref name="kind" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> property set to <paramref name="target" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property set to <paramref name="type" />, and <paramref name="value" /> to be passed to the target label upon jumping.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Kind" /> 等于 <paramref name="kind" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.GotoExpression.Target" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="target" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="type" />，此外还有一个在跳转时将传递给目标标签的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 属性所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: It should be null if the property is <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="shared" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果属性为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="shared" />），则它应为 null。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the property to index.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，它表示要编制索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: An <c>IEnumerable<Expression></c> (<c>IEnumerable (Of Expression)</c> in Visual Basic) that contains the arguments that will be used to index the property.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <c>IEnumerable<Expression></c>（在 Visual Basic 中为 <c>IEnumerable (Of Expression)</c>），其中包含将用于为属性编制索引的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> that represents accessing an indexed property in an object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />，它表示访问对象中的索引属性。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the object that the member belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示成员所属对象的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static members.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态成员，这可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> that describes the field or property to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 描述要访问的字段或属性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing either a field or a property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示访问字段或属性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that results from calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用适当的工厂方法生成的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> that represents accessing either a field or a property, depending on the type of `member`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>表示访问字段或属性，具体取决于的一种`member`。

trans-unit.source: If `member` is of type <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>, this method calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A> to create the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`member`属于类型<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>，此方法调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>。

trans-unit.source: If `member` is of type <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>, this method calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A> to create the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`member`属于类型<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>，此方法调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> does not represent a field or property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 不表示字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the try expression.
trans-unit.target: try 表达式的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If null, bodh and all handlers must have identical type.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 null，则 bodh 和所有处理程序必须具有相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The body of the try block.
trans-unit.target: try 块的主体。

trans-unit.source: The body of the finally block.
trans-unit.target: finally 块的主体。

trans-unit.source: Pass null if the try block has no finally block associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 try 块不具有关联的 finally 块，则传递 null。

trans-unit.source: The body of the fault block.
trans-unit.target: fault 块的主体。

trans-unit.source: Pass null if the try block has no fault block associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 try 块不具有关联的 fault 块，则传递 null。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock" />s representing the catch statements to be associated with the try block.
trans-unit.target: 表示要与 try 块关联的 catch 语句的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression" /> representing a try block with the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示具有指定元素的 try 块的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用适当的工厂方法来创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> that specifies the type of unary operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定一元运算类型的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the operand.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示操作数的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the type to be converted to (pass <see langword="null" /> if not applicable).
trans-unit.target: 指定转换的目标类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />（如果不适用，则传递 <see langword="null" />）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />, given an operand, by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 在给定操作数的情况下，通过调用适当的工厂方法来创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that results from calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用适当的工厂方法生成的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The `unaryType` parameter determines which <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> factory method this method calls.
trans-unit.target: `unaryType`参数确定哪个<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>此方法调用的工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `unaryType` is equal to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert>, this method invokes <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Convert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`unaryType`等同于<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert>，此方法调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Convert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `type`parameter is ignored if it does not apply to the factory method that is called.
trans-unit.target: `type`如果不适用于调用的工厂方法，则忽略参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="operand" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="operand" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unaryType" /> does not correspond to a unary expression node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="unaryType" /> 与一元表达式节点不对应。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> that specifies the type of unary operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定一元运算类型的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the operand.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示操作数的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the type to be converted to (pass <see langword="null" /> if not applicable).
trans-unit.target: 指定转换的目标类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />（如果不适用，则传递 <see langword="null" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 表示实现方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />, given an operand and implementing method, by calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 在给定操作数和实现方法的情况下，通过调用适当的工厂方法来创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that results from calling the appropriate factory method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用适当的工厂方法生成的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The `unaryType` parameter determines which <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> factory method this method calls.
trans-unit.target: `unaryType`参数确定哪个<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>此方法调用的工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `unaryType` is equal to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert>, this method invokes <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Convert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`unaryType`等同于<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Convert>，此方法调用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Convert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `type` and `method` parameters are ignored if they do not apply to the factory method that is called.
trans-unit.target: `type`和`method`参数将被忽略，如果它们不适用于调用的工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="operand" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="operand" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unaryType" /> does not correspond to a unary expression node.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="unaryType" /> 与一元表达式节点不对应。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" /> that represents the recursive initialization of members of a member.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示递归初始化某个成员的成员的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含用来填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" /> that represents the recursive initialization of members of a field or property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示递归初始化某个字段或属性的成员的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.MemberBinding" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.MemberBinding" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The `member` parameter must represent a field or property.
trans-unit.target: `member`参数必须表示字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> or <paramref name="bindings" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 或 <paramref name="bindings" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> does not represent a field or property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 不表示字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property of an element of <paramref name="bindings" /> does not represent a member of the type of the field or property that <paramref name="member" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bindings" /> 的元素的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 属性不表示 <paramref name="member" /> 所表示的字段或属性类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding" /> objects to use to populate the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding" /> 集合的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" /> that represents the recursive initialization of members of a field or property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示递归初始化某个字段或属性的成员的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.MemberBinding" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.BindingType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBindingType.MemberBinding" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberMemberBinding.Bindings" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The `member` parameter must represent a field or property.
trans-unit.target: `member`参数必须表示字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> or <paramref name="bindings" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MemberInit%28System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding%5B%5D%29> method to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression> that represents the initialization of two members of a new object.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newExpression" /> 或 <paramref name="bindings" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> property of an element of <paramref name="bindings" /> does not represent a member of the type that <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bindings" /> 的元素的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding.Member" /> 属性不表示 <paramref name="newExpression" />.Type 所表示的类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic remainder operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示算术余数运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic remainder operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示算术余数运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Modulo" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Modulo" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the modulus operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载取模运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined modulus operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的取模运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined modulus operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的取模运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The modulus operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义取模运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic remainder operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示算术余数运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Modulo" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Modulo" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 该操作的实现方法是选择根据以下规则：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the modulus operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载取模运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined modulus operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的取模运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined modulus operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的取模运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the modulus operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义取模运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic multiplication operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的算术乘法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Multiply" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Multiply" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
