trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="initializers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的元素为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> property of an element of <paramref name="initializers" /> represents a type that is not assignable to the type <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initializers" /> 的元素的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 属性表示不能赋给类型 <paramref name="type" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的节点类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property provides a more specialized description of an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> than just its derived type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>属性提供更具体的说明<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>于只是其派生类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> can be used to represent many different kinds of binary expressions, such as a division operation or a "greater than" operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>可以用于表示许多不同类型的二进制表达式，如除法运算或"大于"操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property would describe these binary expressions as <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>属性将描述这些二进制表达式作为<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Divide>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.GreaterThan>分别。

trans-unit.source: The static CLR type of the expression that the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> object represents is represented by the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 表达式的静态 CLR 类型，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>对象表示由<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise complement operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位求补运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise complement operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位求补运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是用户定义的类型定义一元 not 运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric or Boolean type, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`expression`。类型是数值或布尔类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型可赋给实现的方法的参数类型，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `expression`.类型是可以为 null 的值类型，不可为 null 的对应类型相当于实现的方法的自变量类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`，节点的类型是`expression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a logical NOT operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表示逻辑表达式不操作。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The unary not operator is not defined for <paramref name="expression" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 定义一元 not 运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise complement operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位求补运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementing method can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可指定实现方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Not" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用一个自变量的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是用户定义的类型定义一元 not 运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`expression`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型可赋给实现的方法的参数类型，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `expression`.类型是可以为 null 的值类型和相应的不可为 null 的值类型等同于实现的方法的自变量类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`，节点的类型是`expression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不为 <see langword="null" /> 且其表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />；不为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中不为 <see langword="Shared" />）；或者不是正好带一个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the unary not operator is not defined for <paramref name="expression" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 定义一元 not 运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type (or its corresponding non-nullable type if it is a nullable value type) is not assignable to the argument type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type（如果它是可以为 null 的值类型，则取其相应的不可以为 null 的类型）不能赋给 <paramref name="method" /> 所表示的方法的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不相等比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不相等比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> 属性始终为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the inequality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载不等运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两个条件时，提升节点和节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The inequality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义不相等运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="true" />; <see langword="false" /> to set <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 <see langword="true" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要将 <see langword="false" /> 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不相等比较的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NotEqual" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> property is equal to `liftToNull`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性等于`liftToNull`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are both `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们都`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the inequality operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载不等运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted; also, the type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点;此外，节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是<xref:System.Boolean>。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is nullable <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `true` or <xref:System.Boolean> if `liftToNull` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`true`或<xref:System.Boolean>如果`liftToNull`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the inequality operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义不相等运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 运算的 <see langword="OR" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Or" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Or" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`OR`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为整数或布尔类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是的结果类型预定义的按位`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应的结果类型预定义的按位`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> 运算的 <see langword="OR" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Or" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Or" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`OR`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为整数或布尔类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是的结果类型预定义的按位`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应的结果类型预定义的按位`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义按位 <see langword="OR" /> 运算符。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`OR`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `OR` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 条件性`OR`C# 或 Visual Basic 中不能重载运算符。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `OR` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在条件`OR`运算符计算通过使用按位`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `OR` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此的用户定义重载的按位`OR`运算符可以是此节点类型实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为布尔值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型的相同布尔类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的条件的结果类型`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的条件的结果类型`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a logical `OR` operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表示逻辑表达式`OR`仅当第一个操作数的计算结果为才计算第二个操作数的操作`false`。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义按位 <see langword="OR" /> 运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是同一布尔值类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a conditional <see langword="OR" /> operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，它表示仅在第一个操作数的计算结果为 <see langword="OR" /> 时才计算第二个操作数的条件 <see langword="false" /> 运算。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrElse" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.OrElse" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载的按位的用户定义类型`OR`运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The conditional `OR` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 条件性`OR`C# 或 Visual Basic 中不能重载运算符。

trans-unit.source: However, the conditional `OR` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在条件`OR`运算符计算通过使用按位`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `OR` operator can be the implementing method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 因此的用户定义重载的按位`OR`运算符可以是此节点类型实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为布尔值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型的相同布尔类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的条件的结果类型`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的条件的结果类型`OR`运算符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the bitwise <see langword="OR" /> operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义按位 <see langword="OR" /> 运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type are not the same Boolean type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 并且 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是同一布尔值类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 节点，该节点可用于标识表达式树中的参数或变量。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter or variable.
trans-unit.target: 参数或变量的类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter or variable, used for debugging or printing purpose only.
trans-unit.target: 仅用于调试或打印目的的参数或变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the exponentiation operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载幂运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both <xref:System.Double>, the implementing method is <xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都是<xref:System.Double>，则实现方法是<xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The exponentiation operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义幂运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" />.Type and/or <paramref name="right" />.Type are not <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />.Type 和/或 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不为 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents raising a number to a power.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示对数进行幂运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Power" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Power" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the exponentiation operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载幂运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both <xref:System.Double>, the implementing method is <xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都是<xref:System.Double>，则实现方法是<xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the exponentiation operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义幂运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="left" />.Type and/or <paramref name="right" />.Type are not <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和/或 <paramref name="right" />.Type 不是 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property by using a property accessor method.
trans-unit.target: 使用属性访问器方法创建一个表示访问属性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property accessed in <paramref name="propertyAccessor" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="expression" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 属性设置为表示在 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 中访问的属性的 <paramref name="propertyAccessor" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member%2A>.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The property that <paramref name="property" /> represents is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) and <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="property" /> 所表示的属性不为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），并且 <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type is not assignable to the declaring type of the property that <paramref name="property" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type 不能赋给 <paramref name="property" /> 所表示的属性的声明类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> contains a property named <c>propertyName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 包含一个名为 <c>propertyName</c> 的属性。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" /> for static properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态属性，这可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of a property to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示访问属性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property denoted by <paramref name="propertyName" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="expression" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 属性设置为由 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 表示的属性的 <paramref name="propertyName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> that represents the property denoted by `propertyName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等同于<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>属性<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>表示的属性的`propertyName`。

trans-unit.source: This method searches `expression`.Type and its base types for a property that has the name `propertyName`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索`expression`。类型和用于具有名称的属性及其基类型`propertyName`。

trans-unit.source: Public properties are given preference over non-public properties.
trans-unit.target: 公共属性的优先级高于非公共属性。

trans-unit.source: If a matching property is found, this method passes `expression` and the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> that represents that property to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的属性，则此方法将传递`expression`和<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>表示该属性设置为<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an expression that represents accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表示访问属性的表达式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="propertyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No property named <paramref name="propertyName" /> is defined in <paramref name="expression" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: 没有在 <paramref name="propertyName" />.Type 或其基类型中定义名为 <paramref name="expression" /> 的属性。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 属性所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the property is static/shared, it must be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性为 static/shared，则此对象必须为 null。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。
