trans-unit.target: 属性所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the property is static/shared, it must be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性为 static/shared，则此对象必须为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> that represents the property to index.
trans-unit.target: 表示要编制索引的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that are used to index the property.
trans-unit.target: 用于为属性编制索引的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> representing the access to an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />，它表示对索引属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 属性所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the property is static/shared, it must be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性为 static/shared，则此对象必须为 null。

trans-unit.source: The name of the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 索引器的名称。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects that are used to index the property.
trans-unit.target: 用于为属性编制索引的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" /> representing the access to an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />，它表示对索引属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.IndexExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The containing object of the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的包含对象。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态属性，这可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> that contains the property.
trans-unit.target: 包含属性的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The property to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> accessing a property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个访问属性的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> contains a property or field named <c>propertyOrFieldName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type" /> 包含一个名为 <c>propertyOrFieldName</c> 的属性或字段。

trans-unit.source: This can be null for static members.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态成员，这可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: The name of a property or field to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的属性或字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that represents accessing a property or field.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示访问属性或字段的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />, the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> property set to <paramref name="expression" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> property set to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> or <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> that represents the property or field denoted by <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberAccess" />，<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Expression" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="expression" />，并且 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression.Member" /> 属性设置为表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 所表示的属性或字段的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 或 <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression> is equal to the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> or <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>, respectively, that represents the property or field denoted by `propertyOrFieldName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression>等同于<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>属性<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>或<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>分别表示的属性或字段表示`propertyOrFieldName`。

trans-unit.source: This method searches `expression`.Type and its base types for a property or field that has the name `propertyOrFieldName`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索`expression`。类型和属性或具有名称的字段及其基类型`propertyOrFieldName`。

trans-unit.source: Public properties and fields are given preference over non-public properties and fields.
trans-unit.target: 公共属性和字段的优先级高于非公共属性和字段。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties are given preference over fields.
trans-unit.target: 此外，属性优先于字段。

trans-unit.source: If a matching property or field is found, this method passes `expression` and the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> or <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents that property or field to <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的属性或字段，则此方法将传递`expression`和<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>或<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>表示该属性或字段<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Property%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Field%2A>分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an expression that represents accessing a property or field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表示访问属性或字段的表达式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> or <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 或 <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No property or field named <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" /> is defined in <paramref name="expression" />.Type or its base types.
trans-unit.target: 没有在 <paramref name="propertyOrFieldName" />.Type 或其基类型中定义名为 <paramref name="expression" /> 的属性或字段。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents an expression that has a constant value of type <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示具有类型 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> 的常量值的表达式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Quote" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> represents the constructed type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>, where the type argument is the type represented by `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>表示的构造的类型<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>，其中类型参数是表示的类型`expression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reduces this node to a simpler expression.
trans-unit.target: 将此节点简化为更简单的表达式。

trans-unit.source: If CanReduce returns true, this should return a valid expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanReduce 返回 true，则它应返回有效的表达式。

trans-unit.source: This method can return another node which itself must be reduced.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以返回本身必须简化的另一个节点。

trans-unit.source: The reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 已简化的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Reduces this node to a simpler expression.

trans-unit.source: If CanReduce returns true, this should return a valid expression.

trans-unit.source: This method can return another node which itself must be reduced.

trans-unit.source: The reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 已简化的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Reduce, this method checks that the reduced node satisfies certain invariants.
trans-unit.target: 与 Reduce 不同，此方法检查减少的节点满足某些固定协定。

trans-unit.source: Reduces the expression to a known node type (that is not an Extension node) or just returns the expression if it is already a known type.
trans-unit.target: 将表达式简化为已知节点类型（即非 Extension 节点）或仅在此类型为已知类型时返回表达式。

trans-unit.source: The reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 已简化的表达式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise right-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位右移运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载右移位运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型是整数类型 (之一<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或可以为 null 的对应类型) 和`right`。类型是<xref:System.Int32>，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的右移位运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的右移位运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The right-shift operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义右移位运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents a bitwise right-shift operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示按位右移运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.RightShift" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载右移位运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is <xref:System.Int32>, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型是整数类型 (之一<xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt64>，或可以为 null 的对应类型) 和`right`。类型是<xref:System.Int32>，则实现方法是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的右移位运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的右移位运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the right-shift operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic subtraction operation that does not have overflow checking.

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载减法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an expression that subtracts the argument from the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建减从第一个参数的自变量的表达式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The subtraction operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that represents an arithmetic subtraction operation that does not have overflow checking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不进行溢出检查的算术减法运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />, and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Subtract" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />、<see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载减法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the subtraction operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression> has the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A> property set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression>具有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Method%2A>属性设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 下面的规则确定该操作所选实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载减法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The subtraction operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Right" />。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.Conversion%2A> 属性为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 以下信息介绍了实现的方法中，节点类型，以及是否提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation :
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用两个参数的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that method is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>任一属性`left`或`right`表示重载减法运算符的用户定义类型<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示指示方法是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型可分配给相应的自变量类型的实现方法，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `left`.类型和`right`。类型是这两个值类型，其中至少一个可以为 null，相应不可为 null 的类型是等于实现方法的相应参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`left`。类型和`right`。类型都可以为 null，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于预定义的减法运算符的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="left" /> or <paramref name="right" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 或 <paramref name="right" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly two arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，它所表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />，而不是 <see langword="static" />（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），或者并非采用两个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the subtraction operator is not defined for <paramref name="left" />.Type and <paramref name="right" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，且没有为 <paramref name="left" />.Type 和 <paramref name="right" />.Type 定义减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression" /> that represents a <see langword="switch" /> statement.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression" /> 语句的 <see langword="switch" />。

trans-unit.target: 要针对每个分支测试的值。

trans-unit.target: 此 switch 表达式的分支集。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression" /> that represents a <see langword="switch" /> statement without a default case.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示不带默认分支的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression" /> 语句的 <see langword="switch" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase> objects in a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression> object must have the same type, unless the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression> has the type `void`.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase>中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression>对象必须具有相同的类型，除非<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchExpression>具有类型`void`。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase> object has an implicit `break` statement, which means that there is no implicit fall through from one case label to another.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.SwitchCase>对象具有一种隐式`break`语句，这意味着无隐式贯穿从一个 case 标签到另一个。

trans-unit.source: If `switchValue` does not match any of the cases, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`switchValue`任何不匹配的情况下，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> is the type of the expression tree node, whereas the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> represents the static common language runtime (CLR) type of the expression that the node represents.

trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示一元正运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a unary plus operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示一元正运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.UnaryPlus" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.UnaryPlus" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are false.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是 false。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary plus operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是用户定义的类型定义一元加运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`expression`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型可赋给实现的方法的参数类型，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `expression`.类型是可以为 null 的值类型和相应的不可为 null 的值类型等同于实现的方法的自变量类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`，节点的类型是`expression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The unary plus operator is not defined for <paramref name="expression" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 定义一元正运算符。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> to set the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> property equal to.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 属性设置为与其相等的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents a unary plus operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示一元正运算的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property equal to <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.UnaryPlus" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> and <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> properties set to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 属性等于 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.UnaryPlus" />，并且其 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method" /> 属性设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> is set to the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Method%2A>属性生成<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>设置为实现方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A> property is set to the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Type%2A>属性设置为节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the node is lifted, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提升节点，<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLifted%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.BinaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>属性均`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they are false.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们是 false。

trans-unit.source: Implementing Method
trans-unit.target: 实现方法

trans-unit.source: The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation:
trans-unit.target: 以下规则确定该操作的实现方法：

trans-unit.source: If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes one argument, it is the implementing method for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`不`null`，它表示非空， `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 采用一个自变量的方法是节点实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary plus operator, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents that operator is the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是用户定义的类型定义一元加运算符，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示该运算符是实现方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果`expression`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted
trans-unit.target: 节点类型和提升 / 非提升

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is not `null`:
trans-unit.target: 如果实现的方法不是`null`:

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型可赋给实现的方法的参数类型，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下两种情况，则提升节点和节点的类型为 null 的类型对应于实现的方法的返回类型：

trans-unit.source: `expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: `expression`.类型是可以为 null 的值类型和相应的不可为 null 的值类型等同于实现的方法的自变量类型。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.
trans-unit.target: 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type.
trans-unit.target: 如果该实现方法是`null`，节点的类型是`expression`。类型。

trans-unit.source: If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression`。类型是不可为 null，则不提升节点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the node is lifted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，则提升节点。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and the method it represents returns <see langword="void" />, is not <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic), or does not take exactly one argument.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 不为 <see langword="null" /> 且其表示的方法返回 <see langword="void" />；不为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中不为 <see langword="Shared" />）；或者不是正好带一个参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" /> and the unary plus operator is not defined for <paramref name="expression" />.Type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且没有为 <paramref name="expression" />.Type 定义一元正运算符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="expression" />.Type (or its corresponding non-nullable type if it is a nullable value type) is not assignable to the argument type of the method represented by <paramref name="method" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" />.Type（如果它是可以为 null 的值类型，则取其相应的不可以为 null 的类型）不能赋给 <paramref name="method" /> 所表示的方法的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> to unbox.
trans-unit.target: 要取消装箱的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 表达式的新 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> that represents an explicit unboxing.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个表示显式取消装箱的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 节点，该节点可用于标识表达式树中的参数或变量。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter or variable.
trans-unit.target: 参数或变量的类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 节点，该节点可用于标识表达式树中的参数或变量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node with the specified name and type
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名称和类型的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 节点

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter or variable.
trans-unit.target: 参数或变量的类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter or variable.
trans-unit.target: 参数或变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name is used for debugging or printing purpose only.
trans-unit.target: 此名称仅用于调试或打印目的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node that can be used to identify a parameter or a variable in an expression tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 节点，该节点可用于标识表达式树中的参数或变量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> node with the specified name and type.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名称和类型的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 节点。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Func`2" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Func`2" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Reduces the node and then calls the visitor delegate on the reduced expression.
trans-unit.target: 简化节点，然后对简化的表达式调用访问者委托。

trans-unit.source: The method throws an exception if the node is not reducible.
trans-unit.target: 该方法在节点不可简化时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The expression being visited, or an expression which should replace it in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的表达式，或应在树中替换此表达式的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide logic to walk the node's children.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以提供逻辑，以引导节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: A typical implementation will call visitor.Visit on each of its children, and if any of them change, should return a new copy of itself with the modified children.
trans-unit.target: 一个典型的实现将调用访问者。在每个子代，访问并如果任何这些更改，则应返回其自身的修改后的子项的新副本。
